title: Ore no Negai wa - Novel Updates
tags: Dark   Depictions of Cruelty   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Short Story
author: A99
description:
I was dying. As if obvious God then appeared in front of me. That God said:

“Just this once, I will make one of your wishes come true.”

After being troubled about what to ask, I decided.

“I wish to have unlimited wishes.”>
